item.title: 3 Types of Clouds You Should Know About
item.description:
The increasing popularity of cloud-based IT services might leave you wondering if you’re missing out. To help you decide, let’s explore the three primary cloud types and which applications are well-suited for cloud environments. These days, it seems everyone is offering cloud services, primarily based on three architectures: public, private, and hybrid clouds. The most common is the public cloud, a specialized data center owned and operated by a provider serving numerous paying customers concurrently...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/3-types-of-clouds-you-should-know-about/
